name: Dwarf Quest
description:
"Dwarf Quest is an old school throwback to those epic adventure games of my childhood. If you are a fan of dungeon crawls, this is a must-have game." - AppAdvice.com

"Dwarf Quest offers wonderful simplicity, allowing anyone to pick up and play the game." - iPadClub.nl

"[Combat] feels almost like that of a board game. There is an elegance to its simplicity. The result is an accessible, fast paced battle system that feels almost arcade-y, almost puzzle-y, and never boring. I was quite taken with it." - Gamezebo.com

"Dwarf Quest is a fun, fast adventure game." - iPhoneClub.nl

"Dwarf Quest is a great little gem." - IndieGameMag.com


ADVENTURE AWAITS!

Do you remember crawling through dungeons in video and board games in the 90's? Dwarf Quest revisits such classic experiences, reimagined for your iPad, iPhone and iPod touch.

Play as Morrin Firebeard, proud dwarven warrior. Explore forgotten dungeons, slay terrible monsters and find glorious treasure! Will you be able to survive, and ultimately track down the undead wizard Azar?


FEATURES

* Intuitive touch controls
* Atmospheric graphics
* Fantastic original soundtrack
* Dungeon crawling exploration
* Fast-paced, turn-based combat that plays like a board game
* Battle Cards to boost your skills
* 9 levels including two bossfights
* Universal app (tested on all iPads, iPhone 4S and iPod touch 4)


Prove you are hero enough to beat the Dwarf Quest!
